data:query.name: Report
data:query.data:static-query: SELECT DA.ACCOUNT_BILLING_ADDRESS_COUNTRY COUNTRY ,DU.USER_FULL_NAME AGENT_NAME ,DP.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NAME PRODUCT_CATEGORY ,DP.PRODUCT_NAME ,SUM(FS.SALE_QUANTITY) QUANTITY_SOLD ,SUM(FS.SALE_COST_PRICE_AMOUNT) * SUM(FS.SALE_QUANTITY) TOTAL_COST ,SUM(FS.SALE_TOTAL_DISCOUNT_AMOUNT) TOTAL_DISCOUNT ,SUM(FS.SALE_TOTAL_AMOUNT) TOTAL_REVENUE FROM F_SALES FS INNER JOIN D_PRODUCTS DP USING(PRODUCT_TK) INNER JOIN D_USERS DU ON FS.ASSIGNED_USER_TK = DU.USER_TK INNER JOIN D_ACCOUNTS DA ON FS.BILLING_ACCOUNT_TK = DA.ACCOUNT_TK INNER JOIN D_DATE DD ON FS.SALE_PAID_DATE_TK = DD.DATE_TK WHERE (DD.`YYYY-MM` IN (${pSalePaidDateFilter}) OR '9999-99' IN (${pSalePaidDateFilter})) AND (DA.ACCOUNT_BILLING_ADDRESS_COUNTRY IN (${pCountryFilter}) OR 'All Countries' IN (${pCountryFilter})) AND (FS.SALE_LINE_DELETED = ${pShowDeletedRecords} OR 1 = ${pShowDeletedRecords}) GROUP BY 1,2,3,4 ORDER BY 1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8;
